metadata.title: CVE-2024-3044 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - medium
metadata.description:
Unchecked script execution in Graphic on-click binding in affectedLibreOffice versions allows an attacker to create a document which withoutprompt will execute scripts built-into LibreOffice on clicking a graphic.Such scripts were previously deemed trusted but are now deemed untrusted.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2024-3044` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

fonts-opensymbol - 4:102.12+LibO7.6.7-0ubuntu0.23.10.2
gir1.2-lokdocview-0.1 - 4:7.6.7-0ubuntu0.23.10.2
libjuh-java - 4:7.6.7-0ubuntu0.23.10.2
